transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir namaste.
Executive: Namaste sir very good morning. Namaste sir namaste sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Ji bataye sir kal kya sir wo buy lead loss hota ja raha hai.
Customer: Wo ye nahi aata hai buy lead.
Customer: Buy lead nahi aata hai.
Customer: Haan matlab ye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir wo jaise abhi filhal aap hi kar rahe hain matlab buy lead pe kaam ya wahi kar rahe hain jo last time kar rahe the.
Customer: Haan wahi kar rahe hain na.
Executive: Wahi kar rahe hain. To abhi 36 buy lead hai to customer bhi nahi rehta hai matlab utna aata hi nahi hume.
Customer: Aap to 36 buy lead dete the lekin aage call karne ke liye ye nahi rehta.
Executive: Abhi to pura pan India deal karte honge na sir aap.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Pura India deal karte honge na pura India ke andar.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Maharashtra aur Karnataka jyada focus hai.
Executive: Maharashtra Karnataka jyada Rajasthan wagera.
Customer: Wo nahi jyada.
Executive: Rajasthan nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jharkhand wagera.
Customer: Wo nahi sirf Maharashtra aur Karnataka 500 kilometer area matlab company ka.
Executive: Lead to lead to aa rahi hai sir dekhiye Karnataka ki lead aayi hai Sanoli 2 ya 4 kilo ka lekin 36 buy lead aana matlab 36 nahi 72 to aana chahiye na matlab usme se.
Customer: 36 me choose karne ka mauka mile to buy lead nahi aayega to kaise check karenge.
Executive: 12 12 kilo ke hisab se quantity aayi hai.
Customer: Kya aaya hai? 12 kilo 12 kilo ke hisab se quantity aayi hai 12 kilo ke hisab se ek hamare pass Karnataka hai phosphate ka.
Customer: To copper wiring ka sir.
Customer: Bahut kam hua manufacturing uske hisab se to bulk me thoda chahiye na dukandar nahi.
Executive: Kitna minimum rehna chahiye sir aapke pass 300 kilo ke aage to rehna chahiye na.
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab wo price price jo value hota hai na uska.
Executive: Ki matlab kitna paise ke according agar man lijiye 20 20000 hoga 25000.
Customer: 1000 kuch product hai to 300 kilo ka dekho nahi 3 lakh ke aage hona chahiye na.
Executive: 3 lakh. Ye product mahanga hai isliye amount jyada dikhta hai product 1000 kg ke upar jaye na abhi.
Executive: Jaise minimum main batata hu jaise aap winding wire me deal karte hai na to winding wire me agar ek wire ki dimension 1 mm ke hisab se batau to kitna price hota hai agar quantity agar man lo 80 kilo jayegi to 80 kilo ke hisab se 60 70000 banega.
Customer: Haan 80000 hota hai na aaj ka rate.
Executive: Haan to wahi main aapse puch raha hu ki minimum order value kyuki dekhiye ek baat batata hu sir abhi filhal agar aapko ek to aap jo manufacturing karte hai na wo pure pan India nahi karte hai.
Executive: Kuch particular areas me karte hai.
Executive: Kuch particular areas me agar baat kare to Maharashtra ho gaya aapka Karnataka ho gaya hai na sir. Jab agar pan India me aap deal karne lag jate hai na sir to baat kuch change ho jayega pan India me kya hota hai buy lead ka flow jyada hota hai kyuki pure all over India se buy lead aati hai Gujarat se aati hai Jharkhand se aati hai Rajasthan se aati hai.
Customer: Abhi ji iska alag correct hai isliye nahi karte na hum pan India me.
Executive: Haan main main aapki baat samajh raha hu main aapka pehle target hai ki idhar 500 kilo ka area cover karke fir area badhane ka aisa hai na.
Customer: Company ke hisab se chalna padta hai na.
Executive: Wo wo wo baat thik hai lekin jab agar aap pan India kaam nahi karte na sir to ek particular jaise state me karte hai Karnataka karte hai waha karte hai to fir usme Karnataka wagera me thoda sa buy lead ki quantity kam aayegi buy lead to aayegi aapke pass us area ke bhi.
Executive: Lekin jaise 12 buy lead bhi bahut kam aa rahe hai sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo main dekh raha hu lekin jaise agar aayegi bhi to aapke pass jaise quantity rahega to 12 kg rahega ya 13 kg ya 20 kg to at least filhal isme na itni buy lead ko consume kariye jisse ki aapka ROI generate ho jaye waha se nikle jab buy lead aap consume karne lag jayenge na us area se daily basis pe to automatic aapke pass buy lead aayega.
Customer: Aap package ke samay bole the ki hum jaise le gaye to TrustSeal me jaye to aapka competition 50% kam hoga aisa kuch bhi nahi hua jo MDC hai wahi chal raha hai aisa lag raha hai.
Customer: 2 kilo.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi dekhiye main aapko ye nahi bolunga sir dekhiye MDC TrustSeal dono apni jagah pe thik hai MDC me hota hai ki local package chalta hai local in the sense karoge to basic package hota hai jo all over India me 90% log IndiaMART pe chala rahe hote hai.
Executive: Samjhiega baat ko TrustSeal me kya hota hai ki competition hat jata hai.
Customer: Bole the na matlab aapka jo team manager hai wo bol raha tha ki competition aapka 50% kam hoga.
Executive: Bilkul hoga sir bilkul hoga.
Customer: Iske hisab se matlab difference nahi hai koi bhi abhi char mahine ho gaye ek do mahine to wait kar sakte hai na abhi char mahine jo aapko bolne chahiye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul wo main aapki baat samajh raha hu sir aap apni jagah pe thik hai lekin problem kya hai ye aap samjhe ki aap jo deal kar rahe hai na pure pan India deal nahi kar rahe hai agar pure pan India deal karte na to competition aur kam ho jata aap karte ek local area me ab local area me aap jis category me deal karte hai usme aur bhi log honge.
Executive: Ye to aap mante honge ye jo buy lead jati hai sabke pass jati hai minimum panch log use karte hai starting me.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aap ek kaam aap ek kaam kariye ye char pe do pe sir ek mahina karke dikhao na.
Executive: Haan bilkul aap ek kaam kariye aap ek kaam kariye main aapko batata hu kaise result aayega aap ek bar main video meet ka link bhejta hu aap video meet pe join kariye main aapko khud dikhata hu kaise buy lead use karna hai hai na fir usi buy lead pe aap kaam karega kuch jarur result milega.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai ji.
Executive: Aap samajh rahe hai main aapko video meet ka link bhej raha hu dekho aapko maine bheja hai mail pe aap ek bar isko join kare aap isse kaam kare.
Customer: Aap WhatsApp pe ye link zara forward kare.
Executive: Achha ek bar aap WhatsApp number bataiye is number pe WhatsApp pe haan same number hai ye usko forward kar dunga.
Executive: 503 hai.
Customer: Ek bar number batayenge sir 9890 hai.
Executive: Haan haan ek bar batayenge pura number nahi aata na ek bar bataye 98.
Customer: 98.
Customer: 90.
Customer: 90.
Customer: 27.
Customer: 27.
Customer: 2941 right.
Executive: Sir 9890.
Executive: 989027.
Executive: 29.
Executive: 98902729.
Executive: 41.
Executive: 41.
Executive: Ji aapko high bheja hai waise aap se discussion bhi chal raha tha hamare manager ka aapko pata hoga sir package ke regarding.
Customer: Haan jab aapne bataya tha.
Executive: Main wahi aapko profit ke bare me bata dunga sir.
Customer: Ye ye aaj se nahi chal raha hai to aage dekh ke kya karenge sir iska result aata hai to aage aadmi swasth hai na iska kuch.
Executive: Sir result aayega main aapko fir bol raha hu main main aapko fir bol raha hu agar video meet pe join kare aapko batata hu iska result aayega aap jis jo aapki buy lead.
Customer: Pehle bhi aise hi bole the ye MDC leke aapka result aayega fir bhi nahi aaya aadmi kitna bar vishwas rakhe.
Executive: Aayega aayega sir dekhiye jo TrustSeal aapka chal raha hai na us TrustSeal me jo aapka bhi package jo hello jo buy lead wagera jo consume kar rahe hai na.
Executive: Hello ek bar unko bhi video meet pe le aaiye.
Executive: Ek bar unko bhi video meet pe le aaiye.
Executive: Hello haan link pe join karna padega kya aapko.
Executive: Haan main unka number bhi to mere pass to nahi hai but main aapke WhatsApp pe dekhiye link bheja unko join karaiye ek bar video meet unko main batata hu kaise kaam karna hai sir itni sari buy lead hai aapke area ki itne sare customer aaye hai kyu nahi aap buy lead consume kar rahe hai bataye aisa to nahi ki buy lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hum mante IndiaMART ki galti hai.
Customer: Haan haan nahi wo to karte hai na usko report dena padta hai na unko bhi kya customer.
Executive: Wahi cheez main aapko bol raha hu wahi cheez main aapko bol raha hu Sagar Sagar ji buy lead hai aapke pass aapki category me buy lead hai daily buy lead aa rahi hai daily aa rahi hai har ek minute pe.
Customer: 2 kilo ka 1 kilo ka hai abhi pichli bar me 13 buy lead loss ho gaya.
Executive: Sir sir 2 hi kilo ka nahi minimum 12 15 20 kilo ka bhi hai main dikhaunga aapko.
Customer: 20 kilo ka sir kitna hota hai 12 aur 20 kilo se company aage growth kaise karega sir.
Executive: Sir abhi main aapko batata hu.
Executive: Sir ek cheez bataye ki pehle to aap pan India deal nahi karte hai aap ek local area me deal karte hai Karnataka me ya kisi category me waha to local area nahi hai bahut bada area hai Maharashtra aur Karnataka bahut hub hai copper line ka wo.
Executive: Sir bada hai bada hai lekin agar buy lead koi aati hai suniye koi buy lead aati hai.
Customer: Haan to Maharashtra Karnataka nahi aayegi na.
Executive: Hello buy lead jo aati hai Maharashtra me bahut jile hai na usme to aana chahiye.
Customer: Ek mahina pura isme dekho isme kya hai.
Executive: Sir jaise Maharashtra ki baat kar rahe hai na to Maharashtra bada desh hai kya lekin koi buy lead order dalta hai.
Customer: Cluster lagaye to pura dikhta hai na sir iska matlab ye nahi na ye humne kiya wo kiya ek bar aap ek bar cluster lagaye to kidhar ka bhi buy lead aa sakta hai na.
Executive: Haan aa sakta hai ek bar video meet pe aaiye na ek bar main batata hu kaise karna hai video meet pe aaiye.
Executive: Haan maine bhej diya WhatsApp WhatsApp pe link bhej diya.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai aate hai.
Executive: Thik hai join kariye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Believes TrustSeal package not providing expected benefits.

- Feels current package is same as MDC.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of pan India dealing.

- Executive offered a video meet to explain buylead usage.

- Executive took customer's WhatsApp number to share link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join a video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, mdc, pan india, whatsapp
